Smart Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that uses sensors and AI technology to automatically straighten and organize clothes.
Magnetic Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that uses magnets to hold clothes in place, making it easy to switch between different outfits.
Modular Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that can be easily customized and reconfigured to accommodate different types of clothes and accessories.
Coat Hanger with Built-in Storage: A coat hanger that includes additional storage compartments for hats, gloves, scarves, and other accessories.
Collapsible Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that can be easily folded and stored when not in use, making it perfect for small living spaces.
